scenario_text.value: (Still, she doesn’t seem scared at all...)
It’s your fault for being so careless.

Leaving a defenseless girl all alone when
you’re surrounded by enemies.

Miyuki! What the hell do you think you’re
doing?! Let her go!
Huh? What are you doing here?

Good. Very, very good.
Another one is ours.
Ugh... Not you! I’m not in the mood today.

Not in the mood?
Whatever do you mean?

Aren’t they on the same side?
Something weird’s going on here!

You need to stop dawdling and capture those
children.

And you need to stop being so arrogant.
Whatever. It’s not like I have a choice.

Anyway, I’ve been wanting to teach you all
a lesson. Bring it on, kiddies!
Here he comes. Get ready, Agumon!
I’m on it, Takuma! I’ll protect you!
